text:
@Surgeon_General You're a coward and you're unfit for your office.
You need to say loudly and clearly: Do NOT follow the advice of the cretinous 'president' and do NOT inject disinfectant into your veins or try and cure your coronavirus infection by lying in a tanning bed.
